about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: You are driving on the freeway behind a large truck. You should drive:

about.name: You are driving on the freeway behind a large truck. You should drive:

hasPart.assesses: You are driving on the freeway behind a large truck. You should drive: | You are driving on the freeway behind a large truck. You should drive: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is necessary to follow farther behind a large truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle because trucks have larger blind spots.

suggestedAnswer.text: Closer behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: Closer behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Farther behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: Farther behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: To the right side of the truck and wait to pass.

comment.text: To the right side of the truck and wait to pass.

acceptedAnswer.text: Farther behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: Farther behind the truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: It is necessary to follow farther behind a large truck than you would if following a passenger vehicle because trucks have larger blind spots.

hasPart.name: Increase your following distance when driving behind a large vehicle:

about.name: Increase your following distance when driving behind a large vehicle:

hasPart.assesses: Increase your following distance when driving behind a large vehicle: | Increase your following distance when driving behind a large vehicle: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Drivers of trucks, buses, vans, and any vehicles pulling campers or trailers may not be able to see you if you are driving directly behind them. Increase your following distance when driving behind one of these vehicles. Additionally, large vehicles can block your view of the road, so increase your following distance to look around the sides of the vehicle and see the road ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: To better see around the sides of the vehicle.

comment.text: To better see around the sides of the vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because other drivers tend to pull behind large vehicles before trying to pass them.

comment.text: Because other drivers tend to pull behind large vehicles before trying to pass them.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because following too closely will get you caught in the vehicle's slipstream.

comment.text: Because following too closely will get you caught in the vehicle's slipstream.

acceptedAnswer.text: To better see around the sides of the vehicle.

comment.text: To better see around the sides of the vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: Drivers of trucks, buses, vans, and any vehicles pulling campers or trailers may not be able to see you if you are driving directly behind them. Increase your following distance when driving behind one of these vehicles. Additionally, large vehicles can block your view of the road, so increase your following distance to look around the sides of the vehicle and see the road ahead.

comment.text: Increase your following distance when driving behind a large vehicle: | Drivers of trucks, buses, vans, and any vehicles pulling campers or trailers may not be able to see you if you are driving directly behind them. Increase your following distance when driving behind one of these vehicles. Additionally, large vehicles can block your view of the road, so increase your following distance to look around the sides of the vehicle and see the road ahead.

hasPart.name: This white sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This white sign means: | This white sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: The railroad crossing is controlled. Continue at your regular speed.

comment.text: The railroad crossing is controlled. Continue at your regular speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

comment.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop at the railroad tracks and wait for a signal before crossing.

comment.text: Stop at the railroad tracks and wait for a signal before crossing.

acceptedAnswer.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

comment.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

answerExplanation.text: When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

comment.text: This white sign means: | When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

hasPart.name: Smoking inside a vehicle with a person younger than 18 years of age is:

about.name: Smoking inside a vehicle with a person younger than 18 years of age is:

hasPart.assesses: Smoking inside a vehicle with a person younger than 18 years of age is: | Smoking inside a vehicle with a person younger than 18 years of age is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: In California, it is illegal to smoke in a vehicle at any time when a minor is present.

suggestedAnswer.text: Legal, if it is your child.

comment.text: Legal, if it is your child.
Illegal at all times.
Not restricted by law.
Illegal at all times.

answerExplanation.text: In California, it is illegal to smoke in a vehicle at any time when a minor is present.

hasPart.name: A distraction when driving is:
hasPart.assesses: A distraction when driving is: | A distraction when driving is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A distraction when driving is anything that takes your attention away from driving. Driver distractions may occur anytime and anywhere. Distracted driving can cause collisions, resulting in property damage, injury, and death.

suggestedAnswer.text: Anything that causes evasive action while driving.

comment.text: Anything that causes evasive action while driving.

suggestedAnswer.text: Anything that takes your attention away from driving.

comment.text: Anything that takes your attention away from driving.

suggestedAnswer.text: Anything that causes you to pay more attention to driving.

comment.text: Anything that causes you to pay more attention to driving.

acceptedAnswer.text: Anything that takes your attention away from driving.

comment.text: Anything that takes your attention away from driving.

answerExplanation.text: A distraction when driving is anything that takes your attention away from driving. Driver distractions may occur anytime and anywhere. Distracted driving can cause collisions, resulting in property damage, injury, and death.

comment.text: A distraction when driving is: | A distraction when driving is anything that takes your attention away from driving. Driver distractions may occur anytime and anywhere. Distracted driving can cause collisions, resulting in property damage, injury, and death.

hasPart.name: You must notify the DMV within five days if you:

about.name: You must notify the DMV within five days if you:

hasPart.assesses: You must notify the DMV within five days if you: | You must notify the DMV within five days if you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You are required by law to contact the DMV within five calendar days from the date you sell or transfer the title of a vehicle to another owner. They must be notified of every title transfer.

suggestedAnswer.text: Are cited for a traffic violation.

comment.text: Are cited for a traffic violation.
Sell or transfer your vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Paint your vehicle a different color.

comment.text: Paint your vehicle a different color.
Sell or transfer your vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: You are required by law to contact the DMV within five calendar days from the date you sell or transfer the title of a vehicle to another owner. They must be notified of every title transfer.

comment.text: You must notify the DMV within five days if you: | You are required by law to contact the DMV within five calendar days from the date you sell or transfer the title of a vehicle to another owner. They must be notified of every title transfer.
